item.title: Cladun X3 update now available, adds new end-game content
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/cladun-x3-update-now-available-adds-new-end-game-content

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

New dungeons, artifacts, magic circles, and more.

Nippon Ichi Software has released a free update for ClaDun X3, which adds various new end-game content.

Here is an overview of the update:

  • New Rangeon “Megageon” added
  • New hidden dungeons added – Unlocked after clearing the main story.
  • New end-game feature “Strengthen Enemies” added – Unlocked after clearing the main story. When activated, it exponentially boosts the abilities of dungeon monsters. Additionally, when active, there is a slight chance of obtaining end-game artifacts called “Super Limit Break Artifacts.”
  • New end-game artifacts added
  • New end-game equipment titles added
  • New end-game magic circles added
  • Various quality-of-life updates, improvements, and bug fixes

Cladun X3 is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch in Japan.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.
